meanings.definition: The production of electric current at the junction of two substances exposed to light.
meanings.sent1: Photovoltaics can generate electricity from sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Many homes use photovoltaics to power their appliances.
meanings.sent3: The photovoltaics at work in the garden light up the pathway at night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like photovoltaics, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The photovoltaics on the roof gleamed in the afternoon sun.

meanings.definition: The technology of converting sunlight into electricity using semiconducting materials.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are researching ways to improve photovoltaics efficiency.
meanings.sent2: Solar panels are a common application of photovoltaics.
meanings.sent3: The photovoltaics in the calculator make it work without batteries.
meanings.sent4: His idea was a ray of hope, like photovoltaics in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The photovoltaics installation on the building saved energy costs.
